i don't like dissing people i don't know personally, but i gotta make an exception for you, dew. you're an idiot. plain and simple. the flaws in tf:tm are there but they don't make it a bad movie! yes, they cursed, but it was a theatrical release! 2 curse words! woooowww! i can definately see the problem now! God! why weren't more parents in an uproar about this satan spawned movie! call jerry falwell!
anyway...if your abvously young ass watched any post movie eps of g1 
(which, let's be real here, you didn't.)
you'd know that the leader after hot rod was then fort max. you need to lay off g1 or find another continuity to follow.
  

P.S.: ....Dumbass.
